label: clinical_signal_03_dx_vaccine_immunogenicity_016
content:
## 2024-06-17 Daily Operations Summary

### Enrollment
- Total Enrolled: 128
- Active: 121
- Screen Failures Cumulative: 23
- Withdrawals Cumulative: 7
- Low Dose: 31
- Mid Dose: 32
- High Dose: 32
- Placebo: 33

### Immunogenicity By Group
- Low Dose
  - IgG Titer (GMU) Mean: 76.3
  - IgG Titer (GMU) SD: 6.0
  - IgM Titer (GMU) Mean: 18.9
  - IgM Titer (GMU) SD: 4.0
  - Neutralizing Ab ID50 Mean: 117.6
  - Neutralizing Ab ID50 SD: 10.0
  - CD4 Response (SFC/10^6) Mean: 177.0
  - CD4 Response (SFC/10^6) SD: 15.0
  - CD8 Response (SFC/10^6) Mean: 118.0
  - CD8 Response (SFC/10^6) SD: 11.0
  - Seroconversion Percentage: 28.1
- Mid Dose
  - IgG Titer (GMU) Mean: 115.9
  - IgG Titer (GMU) SD: 9.6
  - IgM Titer (GMU) Mean: 27.1
  - IgM Titer (GMU) SD: 6.4
  - Neutralizing Ab ID50 Mean: 189.8
  - Neutralizing Ab ID50 SD: 16.0
  - CD4 Response (SFC/10^6) Mean: 270.0
  - CD4 Response (SFC/10^6) SD: 24.0
  - CD8 Response (SFC/10^6) Mean: 203.0
  - CD8 Response (SFC/10^6) SD: 18.0
  - Seroconversion Percentage: 49.9
- High Dose
  - IgG Titer (GMU) Mean: 155.2
  - IgG Titer (GMU) SD: 13.2
  - IgM Titer (GMU) Mean: 40.0
  - IgM Titer (GMU) SD: 8.8
  - Neutralizing Ab ID50 Mean: 257.9
  - Neutralizing Ab ID50 SD: 22.0
  - CD4 Response (SFC/10^6) Mean: 380.0
  - CD4 Response (SFC/10^6) SD: 33.0
  - CD8 Response (SFC/10^6) Mean: 267.0
  - CD8 Response (SFC/10^6) SD: 24.0
  - Seroconversion Percentage: 64.4
- Placebo
  - IgG Titer (GMU) Mean: 12.0
  - IgG Titer (GMU) SD: 1.2
  - IgM Titer (GMU) Mean: 1.8
  - IgM Titer (GMU) SD: 0.8
  - Neutralizing Ab ID50 Mean: 27.3
  - Neutralizing Ab ID50 SD: 2.0
  - CD4 Response (SFC/10^6) Mean: 35.0
  - CD4 Response (SFC/10^6) SD: 3.0
  - CD8 Response (SFC/10^6) Mean: 28.0
  - CD8 Response (SFC/10^6) SD: 2.0
  - Seroconversion Percentage: 10.2

### Injection Site Reactions
- Pain Percentage: 50.9
- Erythema Percentage: 25.4
- Swelling Percentage: 12.2
- Induration Percentage: 3.7
- Mean Pain Duration (Hours): 33.0

### Systemic Reactogenicity
- Fever Percentage: 18.8
- Fatigue Percentage: 41.0
- Myalgia Percentage: 26.6
- Headache Percentage: 27.6
- Chills Percentage: 6.9

### Safety Labs
- WBC (K) Mean: 7.6
- WBC (K) SD: 1.1
- Lymphocyte Percentage Mean: 34.4
- Lymphocyte Percentage SD: 6.2
- Neutrophil Percentage Mean: 61.1
- Neutrophil Percentage SD: 5.2
- Platelets (K) Mean: 229
- Platelets (K) SD: 41
- CRP (mg/L) Mean: 6.3
- CRP (mg/L) SD: 0.6
- Hemoglobin (g/dL) Mean: 14.8
- Hemoglobin (g/dL) SD: 1.1

### Adverse Events
- AE ID: VI-AE-1658
  - Description: Fever
  - Grade: 2
  - Relatedness: Possibly Related
  - Resolved: True
  - Dose Group: Mid Dose
- AE ID: VI-AE-1626
  - Description: Lymphadenopathy
  - Grade: 1
  - Relatedness: Possibly Related
  - Resolved: True
  - Dose Group: Mid Dose

### Events
- Vaccine lot VX-825 temperature excursion assessed: within acceptable range
- Immunology core lab QC report received

### Notes
- Week 16: Immunogenicity assessments on schedule. 128 subjects enrolled across dose groups. Reactogenicity profiles consistent with prior weeks.
